00034 #include <iostream>
00035 
00036 
00037 namespace dai {
00038 
00039 
00041 
00044 class Var {
00045     private:
00047         long    _label;
00048 
00050         size_t  _states;
00051         
00052     public:
00054         Var() : _label(-1), _states(0) {}
00056         Var( long label, size_t states ) : _label(label), _states(states) {}
00057 
00059         long label() const { return _label; }
00061         long & label() { return _label; }
00062 
00064         size_t states () const { return _states; }
00066         size_t& states () { return _states; }
00067 
00069         bool operator < ( const Var& n ) const { return( _label <  n._label ); }
00071         bool operator > ( const Var& n ) const { return( _label >  n._label ); }
00073         bool operator <= ( const Var& n ) const { return( _label <= n._label ); }
00075         bool operator >= ( const Var& n ) const { return( _label >= n._label ); }
00077         bool operator != ( const Var& n ) const { return( _label != n._label ); }
00079         bool operator == ( const Var& n ) const { return( _label == n._label ); }
00080 
00082         friend std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os, const Var& n ) {
00083             return( os << "[" << n.label() << "]" );
00084         }
00085 };
00086

00088 } // end of namespace dai
